sms.block: We identify and block SMS that have no chance to reach the recipient's inbox. inbox of the recipient.
sms.temporaryError: A temporary problem has occurred on the destination. These recipients will not be automatically excluded from from future SMS.
sms.permanentError: An error occurred while processing the SMS.
sms.dismissal: SMS rejected by the by the recipient's server. We will try again to send the email during 24 hours. If the error persists, the SMS will be reported as a temporary temporary error.
sms.cancelError: The SMS was cancelled before it was distributed.

email.block: We identify and block emails that have no chance to reach the recipient's inbox. inbox of the recipient.
email.temporaryError: A temporary problem has occurred on the destination. These recipients will not be automatically excluded from from future mailings.
email.permanentError: A permanent sending error may be due to an invalid address (incorrectly entered, non-existent destination server...). Permanent errors can damage your reputation as a sender and are automatically blocked.
email.dismissal: Emails rejected by the by the recipient's server. We will try again to send the email during 24 hours. If the error persists, the email will be reported as a temporary temporary error.

batch.block: We identify and block emails that have no chance to reach the recipient's inbox. inbox of the recipient.
batch.temporaryError: A temporary problem has occurred on the destination. These recipients will not be automatically excluded from from future mailings.
batch.permanentError: A permanent sending error may be due to an invalid address (incorrectly entered, non-existent destination server...). Permanent errors can damage your reputation as a sender and are automatically blocked.
batch.dismissal: Emails rejected by the by the recipient's server. We will try again to send the email during 24 hours. If the error persists, the email will be reported as a temporary temporary error.

smartflow_desc_about: With Tessi Digital Experience platform, manage and distribute all your SMS campaigns, emails, and letters from a single dispatch platform. From a web portal, a printer driver or via an automatic transfer mode, your electronic documents are captured and redirected to Tessi Digital Experience platform for processing, concentration and allotment. Track the production and distribution status of your business communications in real time on the Tessi Digital Experience platform which is available 24/7. We handle acknowledgments of receipts and undelivered post for registered letters for you, and send you the statistical reports of your email and SMS campaigns so you can track them.
smartflow_subtitle_about: Digitalization your campaign with Tessi Digital Experience Platform
